attributes.action: stop busybody Government meddling in our lives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned hate and resent the Government taking an interest in regulating all aspects of our lives - such as smoking, eating, drinking, gambling and consumerism.

It is time that the Government stopped wasting our money and resources trying to regulate our private lives and concentrated on doing the one thing it should be doing well, namely - protecting us from criminal activity and upholding the rule of law.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
